What is this?

This is the nginx server built with lua-nginx-module i.e. OpenResty core.

Unlike standard Nginx or OpenResty binaries, this build links dynamically to its dependencies which are provided as separate packages so you must get them too for nginx to run.

Other OpenResty modules are provided as separate packages as well.

Status

Currently in testing. Not ready for use yet.

HowTo

Like with LuaJIT, a wrapper script is provided to run the right nginx binary for the platform you’re on. The nginx prefix directory is . (i.e. the current directory) which, if you use the wrapper script, is the directory of the script itself i.e. the luapower directory. nginx.conf is also searched for in here (eg. see webb), logs go in logs and temp files go in tmp.

Consult the build scripts for more info on how this was built.
